eto-dashboard-application-description:
Here you can create your ETO application. The information provided will be visible on your ETO profile page as well as setting the smart contract terms of your offering.

You don’t have to fill out your application in one go. You can save the process and return later to make additions or edits. After submitting your application you can still update media links and marketing information.

identity.modal.description:
Your Identity is now stored on the blockchain.

Once you have been successfully verified, a claim indicating such is stored directly on the blockchain. This serves two important purposes: the claim is stored securely and is immutable, while your identity remain unexposed.
investment-flow.amount-exceeds-investmen: Due to transaction costs this amount exceeds your investment limit.
investment-flow.amount-to-invest: Please enter the amount you want to invest
investment-flow.bank-transfer-info-messa: If you invest in the Fifth Force ETO via direct bank transfer, this may take up to 4 business days.. You will receive an an email confirmation when your bank transfer is received. If you do not receive an email confirmation within 5 business days, please contact our support.
investment-flow.bank-transfer-summary.ex: You will receive an email with the below investment summary, if your investment is successful you will recieve another email in 2 to 3 days confirming your investment.
investment-flow.bank-transfer.bank-detai: Funds must be transferred from a bank account matching the verified users' name and country of this account and include your reference number. If the investment is not accepted you will get an email from our support team with an explanation and funds will be returned back to your bank account once the ETO is completed.
investment-flow.bank-transfer.gas-stipen: I agree to increase my investment by a 10 EUR service fee. The fee will be converted into ETH to pay for future blockchain transactions on the platform.
investment-flow.bank-transfer.general-in: Investments via bank transfer take approx. 4 to 7 business days. In order to complete the transfer, please include the reference number when making the bank transfer. Without this we might not be able to connect the transferred funds with your account. Your funds will be converted to nEUR and automatically invested into the Fifth Force ETO. Once received we will send you an email confirmation and will issue the tokens to your account. If the investment is not received before the end of the sale your money will be returned to your bank account once the ETO is completed.

kyc.disclaimer.contents: By providing your information and clicking “Continue” you are consenting to your data being processed. Your personal information is always kept confidential, we never share it with anyone.

kyc.modal.verification.description: We will review your documents within 1 business day and contact you if we require further information. Otherwise, we will notify you by email once your account has been successfully verified.

kyc.personal.high-income: Is your income above 5.000 EUR monthly, or do you have more than 100.000 EUR of assets available?

kyc.personal.instant-id.description: Video Verification (via IDnow): By selecting video verification, you will be redirected to our verification partner IDnow where an agent will verify your proof of identity and proof of address during a short video call. You may complete this process via your computer or mobile phone. The verification results will be presented to you shortly after the call is completed.
kyc.personal.instant-id.manual-verificat: Manual Verification: By selecting manual verification, you will be asked to upload clear color copies of your proof of identity and proof of address. One of our KYC representatives will review your documents and contact you within 1 business day.
kyc.personal.politically-exposed.disclai: You will be asked to provide more details about your situation at a later stage.
kyc.personal.politically-exposed.questio: Are you a Politically Exposed Person?
kyc.personal.politically-exposed.tooltip:
Politically Exposed Person means a natural person who is or who has been entrusted with prominent public functions and includes the following:

  • heads of State, heads of government, ministers and deputy or assistant ministers
  • members of parliament or of similar legislative bodies
  • members of the governing bodies of political parties

kyc.start.description:
The identity verification process helps us get to know you, and will enable a regulated investment process. Regulatory requirements dictate that we verify each new user account. This keeps our platform secure and helps prevent unlawful activity. Once your identity has been successfully verified, you’ll be able to begin investing and enjoy benefits of the Neufund platform.

By choosing to verify a personal account, you are stating that you will invest in your own name. If you intend to invest on behalf of a legal entity, please choose the company verification option.

modal.ipfs-eto.description: Ready to go? Once uploaded, your legal document is public and immutable which means you won’t be able to delete it. We use IPFS, a p2p distributed file system, that gives each document a unique hash and timestamp which we link to a smart contract to make them legally binding.

settings.kyc-widget.error: An error occured while loading data
Below you will find the transaction data that you will need to migrate your ICBM commitment to your verified wallet. Note: You will be conducting two separate transactions during this process.

IMPORTANT:
- The migration process is intended solely for Neufund ICBM investors who wish to migrate their ICBM commitment to a verified wallet that they will use to invest in ETOs.
- During the migration process, do not close this screen. We will monitor the pending transaction and prompt you to the next step once the transaction has been confirmed.

Need help? Check out this guide to walk you through every step of the process.

For users who are migrating from MyEtherWallet:
Click the link that says ‘Open pre-loaded transaction in MyEtherWallet’ and you will be redirected to the MyEtherWallet website in a separate tab. Check that the pre-filled information is correct and execute the transaction.

Return to this page. Once the transaction has been confirmed, you will see a message at the bottom of your screen prompting you to continue to Step 2.

For all other users (e.g., Trezor, imToken):
Open your ICBM wallet interface in a separate tab or window and look for the Send/Receive function on your wallet. Copy and paste the data below into the appropriate fields. Check that the information you’ve entered is correct and execute the transaction.

Return to this page. Once the transaction has been confirmed, you will see a message at the bottom of your screen prompting you to continue to Step 2.

For users who are migrating from MyEtherWallet:
Just as in Step 1, click the link that says ‘Open pre-loaded transaction in MyEtherWallet’ and you will be redirected to the MyEtherWallet website in a separate tab. Check that the pre-filled information is correct and execute the transaction.

Return to this page. Once the transaction has been confirmed, you will see a message at the bottom of your screen indicating that the migration process has been successfully completed.

For all other users (e.g., Trezor, imToken):
Return to your ICBM wallet interface in a separate tab or window and look for the Send/Receive function on your wallet. Copy and paste the data below into the appropriate fields. Check that the information you’ve entered is correct and execute the transaction.

Return to this page. Once the transaction has been confirmed, you will see a message at the bottom of your screen indicating that the migration process has been successfully completed.

shared-component.multi-file-upload.requi:
Required documents:
  • Commercial registry extract
  • Articles of association
  • Shareholder agreement (if applicable)
Depending on your entity's structure, we may require additional documents.

Please ensure that the documents you upload are high-quality, color copies.

Acceptable file types include .png, .jpg and .pdf.

Please note that you are unable to remove any documents after you’ve uploaded them.

Proof of address: This document should contain your full name, address, issue date, and should not be older than 6 months. The name or logo of the issuer should also be clearly visible. Please ensure that you scan the document against a different-colored background, so that all four corners are visible.
Note: If your government-issued ID also contains your address, you may skip this step.

Proof of Identity: This document refers to any government-issued ID / passport or driving license and should contain your name, date of birth, a clear photograph, issue date, and expiry date (if applicable). If the document contains relevant information on both the front- and rear-facing sides, please ensure that you upload clear images of both sides.
Note: Please upload a coloured copy of both sides

tx-sender.tx-pending-watching.descriptio: You have submitted transaction outside of Neufund Platform and it still remains in the Ethereum pending pool waiting to be executed and included in new block. Neufund Platform prevents submitting more transactions if you have still pending one. In most cases this leads to unexpected problems as only one transaction with the same nonce will be mined. We'll wait until transaction specified below is mined.
tx-sender.tx-pending-watching.title: EXTERNAL PENDING TRANSACTION DETECTED
tx-sender.tx-pending.description: Your transaction is being processed by the Ethereum Network. Please be patient as this may take a while. While the transaction is in process, further transactions are unable to be initiated.
tx-sender.tx-pending.title: Pending transaction
wallet-selector.browser.approval-rejecte: You need to approve access to you wallet in order to use our platform
wallet-selector.browser.steps.2: 1. Turn on the MetaMask extension in your browser.
wallet-selector.help-link.label: Help
wallet-selector.ledger-not-supported: Your browser does not support NeuKey. For security reasons we require a recent version of:
wallet-selector.ledger.select-address:
Your Ledger Nano has many addresses. Your ETH and NEU balance is displayed next to each address.
Please choose the one you want to proceed with.
wallet-selector.ledger.start.browser-sup: Ensure you enable "Browser support" on your ledger
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step1.descr: Connect your Ledger Nano to your computer using the USB cable provided.
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step2.descr: Use the left and right buttons to enter your PIN and confirm each number by pressing both buttons simultaneously.
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step3.descr: Use the the left and right buttons to find the Ethereum app and select by pressing both left and right buttons simultaneously.
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step4.descr: Use the right button to navigate to Settings and select by pressing both left and right buttons simultaneously.
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step5.descr: Choose Contract Support and select Yes by pressing both left and right buttons simultaneously.
wallet-selector.ledger.start.step6.descr: Choose Browser Support and select Yes by pressing both left and right buttons simultaneously.
wallet-selector.neuwallet.email-error: Please enter a valid email address
wallet-selector.neuwallet.explanation-1: In a few steps, you’ll be able to start investing on blockchain! The first step is to create your wallet. The Light Wallet is a starter solution for those who are new to blockchain. For larger balances, we recommend using a Ledger Nano.
wallet-selector.neuwallet.explanation-2: IMPORTANT NOTE: You are the only person with access to the private key of the Light Wallet. For your protection, your private key information cannot be accessed, stored or retrieved by anyone else. This gives you full control but this also means that you are responsible for safeguarding the private key to your wallet and the recovery phase.
wallet-selector.neuwallet.login-instruct: To login with your Light Wallet, please click on the access link we sent to your email address after you created your Light Wallet. Having trouble finding the link? You can also recover your wallet using your recovery phrase here
wallet-selector.neuwallet.login.prompt: Sign in to your Light Wallet.
wallet-selector.recover.help.contact-for: Do you need help? Click here
wallet-selector.recover.help.email-login: Please check your inbox for the Access Link you got after creating your Light Wallet
wallet-selector.recover.help.password-fo: I don't remember my Light Wallet password / I lost my access link
wallet-selector.recover.help.recover-wit: Recover your Light Wallet using your 24 word recovery phrase to change your password.
wallet-selector.recover.help.wallet-id-m: I can't find my wallet ID
wallet-selector.recover.seed.recover-des: Please enter your recovery phrase. This will reset your wallet.
wallet-selector.recover.seed.register-de: Your wallet will be imported into a new Neufund account
wallet.deposit-funds.eth.email-notificat: You will receive an e-mail notification once your funds have been successfully transfered.
wallet.deposit-funds.eth.header: Send {icon} ETH to your Light Wallet
wallet.deposit-funds.eur.description: Transfer the desired amount using the account details and reference listed below.
wallet.deposit-funds.eur.email-notificat: You will receive an email notification once your funds have been successfully transfered.
wallet.deposit-funds.eur.header: Transfer {icon} nEUR to your Light Wallet
wallet.deposit-funds.name: Transfer funds / Receive
wallet.name: Wallet
